statements: SELECT * FROM institutions
SELECT institution_name, institution_type FROM institutions
SELECT institution_name, data_sharing_policy FROM institutions WHERE institution_type = 'University'
SELECT * FROM institutions ORDER BY institution_name ASC
SELECT institution_name, institution_type FROM institutions WHERE data_sharing_policy IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM institutions WHERE institution_type = 'University' ORDER BY institution_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT institution_name, data_sharing_policy FROM institutions WHERE institution_type = 'Company' ORDER BY institution_name ASC
SELECT institution_id, institution_name, data_sharing_policy FROM institutions WHERE institution_type = 'Government' AND data_sharing_policy IS NOT NULL ORDER BY institution_name LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(institution_id) AS total_institutions FROM institutions WHERE institution_type = 'University'
SELECT DISTINCT institution_type FROM institutions ORDER BY institution_type DESC
SELECT * FROM institution;
SELECT institution_name, institution_location FROM institution;
SELECT institution_name, institution_location FROM institution WHERE institution_type = 'University';
SELECT student_name, student_age, institution_name FROM student JOIN institution ON student.institution_id = institution.institution_id;
SELECT institution_id, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student GROUP BY institution_id;
SELECT institution_name, institution_location FROM institution WHERE institution_type = 'University';
SELECT * FROM student WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT institution_name, COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM institution JOIN student ON institution.institution_id = student.institution_id GROUP BY institution_name;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM student WHERE institution_id = 'b9f0bd2d-0878-4c0d-b75d-2dac545c40c7';
SELECT * FROM institution WHERE institution_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY institution_name;
SELECT * FROM Institution;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM Institution;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Course WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Course WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Institution
SELECT student_name, institution_name, location FROM Student JOIN Institution ON Student.institution_id = Institution.institution_id
SELECT institution_id, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM Student GROUP BY institution_id
SELECT course_name, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM Course GROUP BY course_name ORDER BY total_courses DESC
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE instructor = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM Institution;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM Institution ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth, course_name FROM Student JOIN Course ON Student.department_id = Course.department_id;
SELECT student_name, department_name, head_of_department FROM Student JOIN Department ON Student.department_id = Department.department_id WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT institution_name, established_year FROM Institution WHERE institution_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Institution WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Student ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE department_id = 2 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM Institution WHERE established_year > 2000 AND location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT department_name, head_of_department FROM Department JOIN Institution ON Department.institution_id = Institution.institution_id WHERE Institution.location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM institution;
SELECT id, name, location FROM institution;
SELECT name, location, id FROM institution;
SELECT id, location, name FROM institution;
SELECT * FROM student;
SELECT * FROM institution ORDER BY name ASC, location DESC;
SELECT name, credits FROM course WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT s.name AS student_name, c.name AS course_name FROM student s INNER JOIN course c ON s.id = c.id ORDER BY s.name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT i.name AS institution_name, e.course_id FROM institution i INNER JOIN enrollment e ON i.id = e.student_id;
SELECT d.shared_data, i.name AS institution_name FROM data_sharing d INNER JOIN institution i ON d.institution_id = i.id WHERE d.id = 5;
